import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalSate} from '../../../../GlobalSate' export default function BtnRender({product}) { const state = useContext(GlobalSate) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const addCart = state.userAPI.addCart return (
{ isAdmin ? Delete Edit : addCart(product)}> Buy Detail }
) }
